programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A couple is ready for a different pace after living in the country for years. They're hoping to find a historic home that lets them hold onto the countryside with a spacious garden. Ben and Erin show them two very different options.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: After being away for 30 years, a woman dreams of retiring in the small town where she has fond memories of her childhood. With her all-in budget of $120,000, Erin designs an elegant home while Ben creates some unique builds including a laundry shoot.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: With an all in budget under $250k, Ben and Erin are able to give the Bell brothers a functioning cafe kitchen, beautiful cafe dining rooms, and an incredibly efficient apartment for Connor.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: When a tornado rips through Laurel, the home Ben and Erin renovated for Nancy and Richard T Jones is severely damaged. They vow to not only restore it to its pre-tornado condition, but to re-imagine it.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A long-time local teacher looks for a house where she can entertain her large family. She has an all-in budget and a wish list that includes a large kitchen and family living area to host her big family get-togethers.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: David and Taneia own a number of rental properties in Laurel and need Ben and Erin's help to help them choose which one will meet their needs as they enter their empty nester phase.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: After falling in love with the small-town energy and hospitality, a couple that was recently recruited by the local hospital looks for a place to live as they start their new jobs as doctors.

programme.title: Renovation Island
programme.desc: Bryan begins work on the two bedroom villa and the crew repairs the hotel block roof. A delayed shipment pushes back the construction schedule. And after a major rainstorm, the Baeumlers make a difficult decision about the opening date.

programme.title: Renovation Island
programme.desc: Progress continues on the villas, but Bryan and Sarah butt heads over priorities. When Bryan has to leave the site for a few days, Sarah is left in charge. Adam and Bryan race the clock to pay their power bill.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: Coy and Kenya are moving to town to be close to their children and grandchildren. As empty nesters, they want to downsize into a historic cottage with an all-in budget of $125,000.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: Amanda is returning to Mississippi after seven years of living in San Antonio, Texas, and she's looking for a historic home with a front porch and room for entertaining for $150,000.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A couple is moving their family of five inland for a new job. They are looking for a large home with architectural details and space for their three kids. Their budget goes a long way as they consider a 5,000-square-foot brick beauty.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A couple with two kids are in desperate need of more space and hope to find a home with a big yard and studio for his work with an all-in budget of $200,000.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: After renting his whole life, a local pastor is ready to settle down in a house that will give him enough space for his cooking and gardening hobbies.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A Laurel, MS, native is ready to plant roots in the place her family has called home for generations. With her all-in budget of $100,000, Erin and Ben create a beautiful transformation that includes a quaint home office and a master bedroom.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: Will, Courtney and their boys have outgrown their starter home, so they enlist Ben and Erin to help them find their forever house. On their wish list is a sizeable, historic house that's rich in character and small town charm.

programme.title: Love It or List It
programme.desc: Jill and Joe love their ranch home's outdoor space, with a nice deck, a pool and a shed that Joe converted into a pub where the whole neighborhood congregates.

programme.title: Love It or List It
programme.desc: Ben and Courtney see their decision to begin a family the perfect time to buy their first home. They've found a 1930s-era, ivy-covered brick home. Despite its charm, this house has a lot of problems, including a flooded basement.

programme.title: Love It or List It
programme.desc: Shelly and Zahid purchased a spacious home over a decade ago that needed many upgrades but had a great view overlooking their backyard and Zahid's favorite feature, the large pond.

programme.title: Love It or List It
programme.desc: William and Ashley bought their cozy, 1950s home in a prime neighborhood when their family was much smaller, but their three growing sons are testing the limitations of the house.

programme.title: Love It or List It

programme.desc: Andrew explores the frontier fare of Denver, Colorado. From classic game meats remade for the modern palette to the signature green chilli sauce of Den-Mex cuisine, Denver has become the region's cultural hub with an abundance of top-shelf food.

programme.title: Food: Fact or Fiction?

programme.title: Food: Fact or Fiction?

programme.title: Food: Fact or Fiction?

programme.title: Food: Fact or Fiction?

programme.title: Man's Greatest Food
programme.desc: Roger Mooking scours the U.S. to find 15 of the best dishes that are all about the sauce. There's sticky toffee pudding, super spicy wings, a fondue burger, drunken scallops and even chocolate plus barbecue.

programme.title: Man's Greatest Food
programme.desc: Roger Mooking joins chefs in their own kitchens as they honour the traditions of comforting and flavorful soul food dishes. From ribs, catfish and barbecue to oxtail, pork chops and cornbread.

programme.title: Man Fire Food
programme.desc: Barbecue is in the blood at two family-run institutions where the dedication for perfecting smoked meats spans decades.

programme.title: Man Fire Food
programme.desc: Roger meets a pit master with a PhD who cooks Carolina-style whole hog barbecue in Louisiana. Dr. Howard Conyers is an engineer for NASA by day, but a pit master at night.

programme.title: Man Fire Food

programme.title: Man Fire Food
programme.desc: Roger visits two caterers in the South who specialize in live-fire cookouts. He starts in Chattanooga, Tennessee where Argentinian grill master Mariano Cebrián has an incredible collection of portable rigs to create fantastical live-fire events.

programme.title: Eddie Eats America
programme.desc: In Miami, Eddie Hall's first stop is a seafood spot for a fresh fried-fish sandwich. Then, Eddie sets his sights at a shooting range before heading to Anna Maria Island, FL, to take on a monster dish of rib-eye steak, pork ribs, lobster and shrimp.

programme.title: Eddie Eats America

programme.desc: A novelist and her boyfriend head to her late grandmother's house for Christmas.

programme.title: Write Before Christmas
programme.desc: A woman writes special Christmas cards to those who inspired her.

programme.desc: A woman is planning the town's Christmas celebration and must win over a firefighter in order to obtain his beautiful spruce for the tree lighting.

programme.title: Christmas by Starlight
programme.desc: When her family's beloved eatery, The Starlight Café, is slated for demolition, Annie vows to put a stop to it before Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas in Evergreen: Bells Are Ringing
programme.desc: As her wedding approaches, a woman steps up to help launch a new museum, all while questioning if marrying her fiancé is the right choice.

programme.title: Five Star Christmas
programme.desc: When a travel writer shows up unexpectedly at their dad's B&B, the Ralston family all pretend to be guests in hopes of a good review.

programme.title: Christmas She Wrote
programme.desc: A romance writer has her column cancelled right before Christmas, so she heads home to reconnect with her family and sparks some romance of her own.

programme.title: Sense, Sensibility and Snowmen
programme.desc: A Christmas enthusiast, and her sister, clash with their latest client, a not-so-jolly toy company CEO.

programme.title: My Christmas Dream
programme.desc: A manager of a department store is determined to land a position in the new Paris location. She sets out to impress the store's owner by creating the best display in stores' history.

programme.title: A December Bride
programme.desc: An aspiring interior designer is dreading the wedding of her cousin, who is marrying her ex-fiancé. She accepts an offer to go with a friend, the one responsible for introducing the soon-to-be bride and groom.

programme.title: Sharing Christmas
programme.desc: A real estate developer is given the opportunity to transform an old shopping complex into a prime location. Unfortunately, there is one tenant who is holding out, the Christmas shop owner he met just days earlier.

programme.title: Christmas Made to Order
programme.desc: A Christmas amateur finds himself in charge of his family's holiday celebration. Desperate for help, he enlists an expert in all things Christmas and together, they discover what's truly important in life.

programme.title: Sleigh Bells Ring
programme.desc: A recently divorced woman struggles to get into the holiday spirit while heading up her hometown parade. With the help of a Christmas sleigh and a handsome woodworker, she is destined to turn her luck around.

programme.title: Home and Family
programme.desc: Martina McBride is here to make cookies and Dave Koz performs with his saxophone.

programme.title: Let It Snow
programme.desc: When a resort executive is sent to a newly purchased lodge in Maine with instructions to turn it into an ultra-modern resort, she finds a charming, successful lodge loaded with holiday spirit and makes a connection with the owner's handsome son.

programme.title: On the 12th Date of Christmas
programme.desc: Two co-workers vying for the same promotion are tasked with creating a 12 Days of Christmas scavenger hunt to promote the premiere of a new hotel.

programme.title: The Christmas Club
programme.desc: Two busy strangers are thrown together to help an elderly woman recover her lost savings. While working together, the magic of the season prevails, leading the couple to discover something they have been missing, love.

programme.title: Christmas Next Door
programme.desc: The author of bachelor lifestyle books, is left in charge of his young niece and nephew for the holidays.

programme.title: Pride, Prejudice and Mistletoe
programme.desc: A career-driven woman finds her life turned upside down when she is forced to return to her hometown to care for her sick mother.

programme.title: One Royal Holiday
programme.desc: A woman offers stranded family a place to stay during a blizzard. Unbeknownst to her, they are members of a royal family. Despite their different backgrounds, the woman shows her guests what a small-town Christmas is all about.

programme.title: Christmas at the Plaza
programme.desc: A historian is hired to create a Christmas display at the Plaza. While working, she learns that fate has prevailed and teamed her up with a handsome decorator to help bring the display, and their romance, to life.

programme.title: Christmas in Homestead
programme.desc: A famous actress heads to a Christmas-obsessed town to film a movie, and is thrown for a loop when a romance brews between her and a local inn keeper, who's a single dad. As she gets a taste of small-town life, she discovers the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas Cookies
programme.desc: A small-town factory, Aunt Sally's Christmas Cookie Company, is sold to large conglomerate. Their executive must seal the deal and shut down the factory, the town's lifeblood, but things become complicated when she meets the new owner.

programme.title: Love You Like Christmas
programme.desc: A high-powered marketing executive on her way to a wedding is derailed by car trouble. A fork in the road leads her to Christmas Valley, and her unexpected journey leaves her wondering what her life has been missing.

programme.title: Chateau Christmas
programme.desc: A world-famous pianist returns The Chateau at Christmas to spend the holiday with her family and rediscover her passion for music.

programme.title: Home and Family

programme.title: Christmas in Love

programme.title: Christmas at the Palace

programme.title: Reunited at Christmas
programme.desc: A novelist and her boyfriend head to her late grandmother's house for Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas Waltz
programme.desc: After a woman's storybook Christmas wedding is canceled, a dance instructor helps her face her fears in life and fulfill her dream of learning to dance.

programme.title: Christmas in Rome

programme.desc: A woman is planning the town's Christmas celebration and must win over a firefighter in order to obtain his beautiful spruce for the tree lighting.

programme.title: The Christmas Bow
programme.desc: When an accident puts her music dreams on hold, a gifted violinist reconnects with an old family friend, who helps her heal and find love during the holidays.

programme.title: Hope at Christmas
programme.desc: A recently divorced woman and her daughter travel to their hometown to sell her grandparents estate, but end up getting wrapped up in the town and its inhabitants.

programme.title: A Christmas Song
programme.desc: When two high school music teacher face losing their jobs due to budget cuts, their fate is to be decided in a televised city-wide Christmas carol contest.

programme.title: Christmas Bells are Ringing
programme.desc: A woman returns to Cape Cod for the first time after her mother's death and falls in love.

programme.title: A Christmas Love Story
programme.desc: A youth-choir director is tasked with writing the title song for her Christmas Eve show but becomes distracted when a gifted boy joins the choir. Unbeknownst to her, this boy does not tell his widowed father of his plans to sing in the service.

programme.title: The Christmas Ring
programme.desc: A reporter searches for the love story behind an antique engagement ring. With the help of the ring's owner's grandson, they learn the legacy his grandparent's left behind.

programme.title: Christmas Under the Stars
programme.desc: A man loses his job right before Christmas, so he takes a temporary job selling trees. While at work, he meets a woman and her son, who are dealing with the sudden loss of her father. The two get to talking, and out of their loss, love grows.

programme.title: Romance at Reindeer Lodge
programme.desc: A group of adults from different parts of the country swear off partaking in holiday events.

programme.title: Holiday Hearts
programme.desc: A woman is forced to help care for her friend’s daughter, with the help of a friend. Along the way, the two of them find not only the Christmas spirit, but also, love.

programme.title: The Angel Tree
programme.desc: A writer seeks the identity of the person who helps grant wishes that are placed upon an Angel tree. In the process, she finds herself reconnecting with her childhood friends.

programme.title: USS Christmas
programme.desc: A reporter heads off on a cruise during the holidays where she falls for a naval officer. Together, the two of them must try to solve a mystery found upon the ship.

programme.title: A Little Christmas Charm
programme.desc: When a woman finds a lost charm bracelet she sets out to find the rightful owner. Along the way she teams up with an investigative reporter to ensure her mission is complete before Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Cranberry Christmas
programme.desc: A separated couple fakes marital bliss on national television to help their town's Christmas festival, and their business.

programme.title: The Christmas Doctor
programme.desc: A travelling doctor is assigned to a small clinic for the holidays and is surprised to learn that she feels right at home.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Christmas
programme.desc: Sarah Davis finds love in an unusual entitled Hollywood star, who visits her family ranch to prepare for a film.

programme.title: A Heavenly Christmas

programme.title: Our Christmas Love Song
programme.desc: A country-singer is accused of plagiarizing her holiday single. Because of this, she is forced to return home to spend the holidays with her family, and an old flame that resurfaces in her life.

programme.title: Christmas Wonderland
programme.desc: An artist is forced to put her life on hold and return home to help her family. While at home, she finds herself working closely with her high-school sweetheart who is desperately searching for a home for his school's Christmas dance.

programme.title: Christmas Encore
programme.desc: A struggling actress is cast in her last off Broadway show before giving up on her dream and moving home.

programme.desc: An accident between a sweet bookshop worker and a handsome stranger leaves him without his memory.

programme.desc: An unbelievable tragedy ripples through a small community and sends John in pursuit of outlaw Jory Worthen. Callahan takes on the case of fugitive Derrell Demon Brown, an offender with a dark past who committed a violent, personal crime.

programme.desc: John and investigators follow the trail of a chilling 911 confession that leads them to dangerous Nimrod Guerrero. And when Frederick McCaskill leaves a survivor clinging to life, police and Cal work to make sure this criminal doesn't elude justice.

programme.title: Still a Mystery

programme.title: Still a Mystery

programme.title: The Wonderland Murders

programme.title: The Wonderland Murders
programme.desc: A cold case from Northern California heats up when Detective Molly Daul ties a brutal assault case she's working on to this twelve year old murder. And when this killer strikes in Portland, multiple homicide detectives team up to take him down.

programme.desc: Maribel Ramos is a US army veteran with a complicated love life. When she arranges to meet an online date, she disappears, leaving family and friends desperate for news. Detectives are left to uncover a twisted tale of jealousy and rage.

programme.desc: Three young girls meet a new friend online. Like other boys in the chat rooms, he's around their age, friendly, and flirtatious. Months later his demeanor shifts, trapping the girls in a vicious game from which they can't escape.
